column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Azula says : " Oh , sounds like the firebending 's back on . "
#Text=Azula says : " Dad 's all the way at the end of the hall then down a secret stairway on the left .
#Text=I used up all our time .
#Text=" Toph says : " It 's not your fault , Sokka .
#Text=Azula was ready for us .
#Text=She had every move planned out .
#Text=" Sokka says : " And now it 's too late .
#Text=" Aang says : " Maybe it 's not too late .
#Text=The eclipse is over .
#Text=But I can face the Fire Lord anyway .
#Text=" Sokka says : " No .
#Text=I do n't think that 's a good idea .
#Text=" Aang says : " But I 'm ready !
#Text=I came here with a job to do and everyone 's counting on me .
#Text=" Toph says : " The Fire Lord knew we were coming this time .
#Text=We thought we had surprise on our side but we did n't .
#Text=It just was n't our day .
#Text=What we need to do now is go and help our friends .
#Text=" Aang says : " I guess you guys are right .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You 'll have another chance .
#Text=I know you will .
#Text="
